about_the_game:
Harlot is a naïve woman who needs to support herself, somehow. Luckily, the village men will help her earn money... After learning some skills, Harlot can hire a manager to increase her earnings, fix-up the town brothel, and even hire women to work for her as well.

Each sex-act starts basic, but unlocks more actions each time you play it. The RPG-Maker leveling system is used to raise Energy and Seduction, and learn new sex-skills. There are no battles in the game. There are 4 playable women (although, Harlot is 80% of the content so far) I've been working on this game since 2016 and am still adding to the game. So far, Harlot's 'path' is done and new content is expanding the other women's storylines, skills, sex-scenes.

The game has 8 unique sex-scenes (plus another 4 unfinished ones), and 16 hours of gameplay so far, There is no planned ending, per se, I just keep adding more content when I have free time. The later sex-events have more content, options and variety... I like making games as a hobby, and I'm open to suggestions for ideas. Negative reviews are welcome, if you write at least a paragraph, so I can understand what to improve. (Note: I can't improve the art in older scenes! LOL)

Also, I could NOT figure out how to upload the MAC version, and don't have a MAC to even test it, so if you want the MAC version, contact me directly.

Game Release version is 1.20 on Steam and will continue to be updated here.

Note: A helpful player found a game-breaking bug! When Abby joins the first time it will freeze the game. I fixed the bug, BUT when your game updates, your save files are GONE! Worry not, for the save files are NOT deleted! RPG Makes is just weird. To transfer your saves please follow these steps:

Right-Click Harlot Path name in left-panel of Steam window (game library)
Choose Properties, Choose Installed Files, Click Browse button.
Select PREVIOUS version. (eg: HarlotsPath120c)
Open folder. Open WWW folder, Copy the save folder (CTRL+C)
go back to main folder and choose new version (eg: HarlotsPath120d)
Open folder. Open WWW folder, Paste the save folder (CTRL+V)

That's it. Your save files are transferred. Also note this works for previous versions (patreon or itch) as well, if you know where the game is installed.

content_descriptors.notes: Adults-Only game. Naive, helpful woman goes through humorous sex-training and becomes a prostitute. Not intended to be a realistic depiction of prostitution.

Harlot is a naïve woman who needs to support herself, somehow. Luckily, the village men will help her earn money... After learning some skills, Harlot can hire a manager to increase her earnings, fix-up the town brothel, and even hire women to work for her as well.

So far, Harlot's 'path' is done and new content is expanding the other women's storylines, skills, sex-scenes.

The game has 8 unique sex-scenes (plus another 4 unfinished ones), and 16 hours of gameplay so far, There is no planned ending, per se, I just keep adding more content when I have free time. The later sex-events have more content, options and variety... I like making games as a hobby, and I'm open to suggestions for ideas. Negative reviews are welcome, if you write at least a paragraph, so I can understand what to improve. (Note: I can't improve the art in older scenes! LOL)

That's it. Your save files are transferred. Also note this works for previous versions (patreon or itch) as well, if you know where the game is installed.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 ~ 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10 ~ 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

name: Harlot's Path

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 ~ 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Made with RPG maker MV
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3

short_description: Humorous story of woman learning to be a hooker in a small village. Skills and leveling are earned from sex, and unlock more sex. 8 unique sex-events and more content added occasionally. Built with RPG Maker MV engine, but no battles, only sex.
